employer.faqSubtitle: Everything you want to know about employer packages

q1.question: How do I change packages?
q1.answer: You can change your package anytime as your needs evolve. Upgrades take effect immediately by paying the difference; downgrades take effect in the next billing cycle.

q2.question: What happens if we exceed the user limit?
q2.answer: When your user count exceeds the package limit, you’ll be directed to the next tier automatically. The difference will be reflected in your next invoice.

q3.question: How is data security ensured?
q3.answer: All data is stored encrypted in ISO 27001-certified data centers. With GDPR-compliant processes, your data is fully protected.

q4.question: How do integrations work?
q4.answer: Bravioo integrates with Slack, Microsoft Teams, HRIS systems and 50+ popular tools. Custom integrations are available via our REST API.

q5.question: How do training and support work?
q5.answer: Setup support is included in all packages. Live trainings are available for Growth and above; on-site training is offered for Enterprise.

q6.question: How does cancellation work?
q6.answer: You can cancel anytime. We keep your data for 30 days after cancellation—reactivation is possible within this period.

aboutUsSection.title: About Us
aboutUsSection.body:
Bravioo is an employee motivation platform built on software and AI expertise as a subsidiary of Albayrak Holding. With our large engineering team and experience from international projects, we build innovative solutions and continuously enrich our platform with new modules.

Today, by partnering with leading brands across industries, we deliver a reliable solution that boosts employee happiness and engagement with benefits, discounts, notification tools, anonymous feedback, and innovative solutions like Bravioo Coin.

manifesto.title: Our Brand Manifesto
manifesto.subtitle: Our mission to unlock human potential
manifesto.content: At Bravioo, we see the human behind the numbers and reports. We believe potential blossoms only with recognition. That’s why we set out to make workplaces not only more efficient, but more human. We use technology as a bridge to strengthen the bonds between people. Because we know great work is done by people who feel valued. We make that value visible.
manifesto.quote: At Bravioo, we see the human behind the numbers and reports. We believe potential blossoms only with recognition.

contactFaq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
contactFaq.subtitle: We compiled the most asked questions about Bravioo. If you can’t find your answer, contact us.

setupTime.question: How long does it take to set up Bravioo?
setupTime.answer: Average setup time is 1–2 weeks. Our team supports you throughout and provides custom trainings. For small companies it can take 3–5 days; for large enterprises, 2–4 weeks.

integrations.question: Which systems can you integrate with?
integrations.answer: We support integrations with Slack, Microsoft Teams, SAP, Workday, BambooHR, ADP, Oracle HCM, and 50+ platforms. With our REST API, we can also build custom integrations.

security.question: How is data security ensured?
security.answer: We hold ISO 27001 and SOC 2 Type II certifications. Your data is protected with 256-bit SSL encryption and is compliant with GDPR and KVKK. All data is stored on servers in Türkiye and the EU.

pricing.question: How does pricing work?
pricing.answer: We use a monthly subscription model based on employee count. Free up to 50 employees, then a per-employee monthly fee. We offer 20% off on annual billing.

support.question: What support options are available?
support.answer: 24/7 live chat, email support, phone support (business hours), video training, and a dedicated onboarding program. Enterprise customers get a dedicated account manager.
